gov.nasa.worldwind.database
Interface DatabaseConnectionPool

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicDatabaseConnectionPool
public interface DatabaseConnectionPool

Method Summary
 void closeAllConnections()
          Closes all the connections
 Connection getConnection()
          Gets the next available connection
 void initialize(AVList list)
          This is an alternative way to initialize a connection pool, if the connection pool instance was created with a default constructor or instantiated using class name Minimal expected parameters are: AVKey.DATABASE_DRIVER_CLASS_NAME AVKey.DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING

Optional parameters are: DATABASE_INITIAL_CONNECTIONS DATABASE_MAXIMUM_CONNECTIONS DATABASE_USERNAME DATABASE_PASSWORD
 void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
          Releases the specified connection and returns it to the active pool

closeAllConnections

void closeAllConnections()
Closes all the connections

getConnection

Connection getConnection()
                         throws SQLException
Gets the next available connection

Returns:
java.sql.Connection the next available connection
Throws:
SQLException - if no connections available

initialize

void initialize(AVList list)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       SQLException
This is an alternative way to initialize a connection pool, if the connection pool instance was created with a default constructor or instantiated using class name Minimal expected parameters are: AVKey.DATABASE_DRIVER_CLASS_NAME AVKey.DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING

Optional parameters are: DATABASE_INITIAL_CONNECTIONS DATABASE_MAXIMUM_CONNECTIONS DATABASE_USERNAME DATABASE_PASSWORD

Parameters:
list - AVList with connection pool parameters
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of the required parameter is missing
SQLException - if there is any database connectivity problem

releaseConnection

void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
Releases the specified connection and returns it to the active pool

Parameters:
connection - The SQL connection
